title: Soul Code
description: I’ve always been on the outside looking in—a female tech genius meeting every conceivable human need for others, yet struggling with a basic fundamental necessity—connection.My days are filled with code and algorithms, but my nights are haunted by isolation and loneliness. When I’m asked to beta test a new advanced AI system created by three brilliant and painfully good-looking colleagues, what I thought was a straightforward task quickly turns into something far more complex.They started watching me.Tracking my every move.What began as simple data collection on their end has transformed into a fixation.The beta test is over, but the three men can’t seem to stop.Watching.Analyzing.Obsessing.They saw my loneliness, my trauma, and now they want to breach the barrier and give me the closeness I crave.But will the secrets they hold break our intense connection?*** SOUL CODE is a medium burn, spicy ‘why choose’ contemporary romance. It is the first book of the Coded Connections Duet and ends on a cliffhanger. Some parts may be triggering. ***
author: Blake Black
